{"step_by_step_thinking": "Pictorial warning labels on cigarette packages are designed to inform and deter individuals from smoking. They can address smoking-related health disparities by raising awareness about the dangers of smoking and potentially discouraging people from starting or continuing to smoke. However, the effectiveness of these labels can vary among different populations and individuals, and they are just one of many strategies needed to address smoking-related health disparities. Therefore, while they can contribute to addressing these disparities, they may not be entirely effective on their own.", "answer_choice": "A. yes"}
